note.p: Death: House of Letterawe, on Loch Awe, Argyllshire (28 October 1946)
Education: University College, London; Royal School of Mines; University of Wurzburg. BSc; PhD

Career: Demonstrator and Lecturer in Chemistry, Royal School of Mines (1880-1888); Professor of Chemistry, University College, Dundee (1888-1894); Professor of Chemistry, Mason College, Birmingham (1894-1919); applied bacteriology to water analysis
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1945-1948 vol 5 pp 697-715, plate, by W E Garner
